Text: RE Sloan Leadership Conference Oct Cc is unable to make the presentation and has asked Vasant Shanbhogue VP in his group to take his place let me know if you need a bio on Vasant or any other information for the session I will forward the attached info on to Vasant J Original Message From Keyur Patel mailto ITEDU Sent Tuesday October PM To Kaminski Vince J Cc Crenshaw Shirley Walt John Elliott Lexi Subject Sloan Leadership Conference Oct To all I have attached a document giving details on the Sloan Leadership Conference this Saturday October I have also attached a map of the MIT Sloan campus The Finance panel in which Mr Vince Kaminski will participate will be held from in the afternoon The room location will be given at registration A full agenda is included in the document I look forward to meeting with you all If you have any questions please do not hesitate to contact me I have included my mobile number in case you need to reach me on the conference day Thanks Keyur Patel MIT Sloan School of Management Class of Mobile
